title: Need to restart client after most games
body:
After nearly every game i need to restart my client. I've even repaired. Whenever I click play again, or join a new lobby after the previous game ends, I get multiple things:

Not being able to see my party, not being able to select roles. Even when i leave the lobby, and try to make a new one, its still bugged.

replies.body: Actually it's worse than that for me, it turns out I somehow even managed to join a ranked game by clicking "Play again" (?) and then was unable to pick anything, giving me a loss of LP and a 20 minute dodge penalty for queue.
Today I just had "Can't join this queue with a party of 0 players"
same problem....can't pick a role to start queue or change game type....getting annoying restarting client after every game

This sounds like a pretty unstable connection problem not being able to communicate actions between yourself and our chat or champion select servers.  Restarting the client won't really resolve this, so I suggest instead going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot whatever is causing your network to act like this.  I hope that helps!

Looks to be after clicking "Play Again" and many people are having that issue, however my brother is not, It also only recently started happening, with no network changes on my side. Repairing the client fixed it for some time, however it's broken again.
